title: Finding Time
description: Eliza Prince is a woman on a mission. After birthing four children she's ready to take back her marriage bed and rescue her husband from the evil clutches of the couch. Though she's nervous Jett doesn't find her attractive anymore due to her stretch marks and years of nursing, her erotic desires and fantasies urge her to make a move before they lose each other for good.Warning: This monogamous novella burns up the pages. It's real and heartfelt. Follow along with Jett and Eliza as they Find Time for each other and bring the spark back to their marriage.
author: E.R. Pierce
